behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        check_remote(remote_control)
        # Check the remote to ensure it works with the TV
        achieve close_char(char, television)
        # Ensure the character is close to the television
        achieve is_off(television)
        # Ensure the television is currently off

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind couch_352: item where:
            is_couch(couch_352)
        
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and close(remote_control, couch_352) and inside(remote
_control, home_office_319)
        # Select the remote control near the couch in the home office

        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and close(television, home_office_319)
        # Select the television in the home office

        use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control, television)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the television
